1.4.1.2.4. ngeoFE_unittests.Mechanics.Cauchy_tests module¶

Created on Aug 24, 2018

@author: Ioannis Stefanou

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in plain strain and linear elasticity
